Since we all need to go "Back to School" from time to time, and my kids are
going back to school, I'm starting a 40% off sale on all titles on my
website.

I'll also be announcing special deals on specific books that will be even
better deals.

Be sure to check out some of the other categories on the website for books
of interest, including Japanese History, Literature, etc.

Order through the website and I'll get back to you with the net amount
including shipping charges (at cost) before your credit card is charged or
PayPal payment initiated.

I do still continue to find books that have not been uploaded, so feel free
to ask if you don't see a book you have been looking for, or especially if
you are looking for recommendations related to a specific subject.

Thanks for looking!

Craig

http://www.bridgeofdreams.com


-- 
Craig Harris
Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com
